name: Gerald KRESS, Appellant, v. WOLF, BLOCK, SCHORR & SOLIS-COHEN, Appellees
name_abbreviation: Kress v. Wolf, Block, Schorr & Solis-Cohen

judges: Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, and SAYLOR, JJ.
Justice NEWMAN did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: Gerald KRESS, Appellant, v. WOLF, BLOCK, SCHORR & SOLIS-COHEN, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 21st day of March 2001, this appeal is dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
Justice NEWMAN did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Theodore J. Chylack, Richard A. Sprague, Philadelphia, for Gerald Kress.
Michael Lieberman, William T. Hangley, Philadelphia, for Wolf, Block, Schorr & Solis-Cohen.
casebody.head_matter:
768 A.2d 291
Gerald KRESS, Appellant, v. WOLF, BLOCK, SCHORR & SOLIS-COHEN, Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Jan. 31, 2001.
Decided March 21, 2001.
Theodore J. Chylack, Richard A. Sprague, Philadelphia, for Gerald Kress.
Michael Lieberman, William T. Hangley, Philadelphia, for Wolf, Block, Schorr & Solis-Cohen.
Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, and SAYLOR, JJ.
